              def search
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                @query = params[:q] || ''
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                @results = []
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                if @query.present? && @query.length >= 2
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    response = ProductService.search(@query, token: current_token)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    @results = response[:products] || []
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    @results = []
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    flash.now[:alert] = "Error searching products: #{e.message}"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                # Return JSON for AJAX requests
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                if request.xhr?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  render json: @results.map { |product|
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    {
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                      id: product[:id],
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      sku: product[:sku],
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      name: product[:name],
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      description: product[:description],
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      base_price: product[:base_price],
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      tax_rate: product[:tax_rate],
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      display_name: product[:display_name],
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                      formatted_price: product[:formatted_price]
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    }
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                else
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  # Regular HTML response for search page
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  render :search
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189.

              def activate
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                begin
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  ProductService.update(@product[:id], { is_active: true }, token: current_token)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  redirect_to products_path, notice: 'Product activated successfully'
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      194.

      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              end
          
      197.

              def deactivate

              end

              def duplicate
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                begin
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  # Create a new product based on the existing one
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  new_product_params = {
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    sku: "#{@product[:sku]}-COPY",
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    name: "#{@product[:name]} (Copy)",
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    description: @product[:description],
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    base_price: @product[:base_price],
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    tax_rate: @product[:tax_rate],
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    currency_code: @product[:currency_code],
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    is_active: false # Start as inactive
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  }
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  response = ProductService.create(new_product_params, token: current_token)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  redirect_to edit_product_path(response[:id]), notice: 'Product duplicated successfully. Please review and activate.'
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  redirect_to products_path, alert: "Error duplicating product: #{e.message}"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227.

              private

              def set_product
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                begin
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  @product = ProductService.find(params[:id], token: current_token)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: set_product - @product = #{@product.inspect}"
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      234.

                end

              def product_params

              def check_permission_to_create

                unless can?(:create, :products)

              def check_permission_to_edit

      255.

      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              # Parse API validation errors into a format the view can understand
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              # API errors come in format: [{status: "422", source: {pointer: "/data/attributes/sku"}, title: "Validation Error", detail: "SKU can't be blank", code: "VALIDATION_ERROR"}]
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              # We need to convert to: {"sku" => ["can't be blank"]}
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

              def parse_validation_errors(api_errors)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                errors = {}
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                return errors unless api_errors.is_a?(Array)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                api_errors.each do |error|
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  next unless error.is_a?(Hash) && error[:source] && error[:source][:pointer] && error[:detail]
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                  # Extract field name from pointer like "/data/attributes/sku"
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  pointer = error[:source][:pointer]
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  if pointer.match(%r{/data/attributes/(.+)})
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                    field_name = $1
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    message = error[:detail]
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

            
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    # Remove field name from the beginning of the message if it's there
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                    # "SKU can't be blank" -> "can't be blank"
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                    field_label = field_name.humanize.downcase
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    message = message.gsub(/^#{Regexp.escape(field_label)}\s+/i, '')
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                    errors[field_name] ||= []
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                    errors[field_name] << message
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  end
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                errors
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

              end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            end
          
      286.

              def create

                  # If user has multiple companies but no default was selected, show company selector

      41.

                  end
          
      42.

                else
          
      43.

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Auth failed, auth_response was nil/false"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = 'Invalid email or password'
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

      47.

              rescue ApiService::AuthenticationError => e

              def store_session(auth_response)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: store_session called"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Session ID before storing: #{session.id rescue 'NO_SESSION'}"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Session keys before storing: #{session.keys.inspect}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                session[:access_token] = auth_response[:access_token]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                session[:refresh_token] = auth_response[:refresh_token]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                session[:user_id] = auth_response[:user][:id] if auth_response[:user]
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                session[:user_email] = auth_response[:user][:email] if auth_response[:user]
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                session[:user_name] = auth_response[:user][:name] if auth_response[:user]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                session[:company_id] = auth_response[:company_id]
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                session[:companies] = auth_response[:companies]
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Session ID after storing: #{session.id rescue 'NO_SESSION'}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Session keys after storing: #{session.keys.inspect}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Stored token: #{session[:access_token].present? ? session[:access_token][0..20] + '...' : 'nil'}"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Stored user_id: #{session[:user_id]}"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: Stored company_id: #{session[:company_id]}"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              def clear_session

    91. 
            

            

                session[:access_token] = nil
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                session[:refresh_token] = nil
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                session[:user_id] = nil
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                session[:user_email] = nil
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                session[:user_name] = nil
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                reset_session
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              end

            end

    app/controllers/tax_calculations_controller.rb

            class TaxCalculationsController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3.

      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def new

                redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Manual tax calculations are not supported by the API. Use invoice-specific calculations instead."
          
      6.

              end

              def create

              def invoice

              def recalculate

              def validate
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                if params[:invoice_id].present?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  @validation = TaxService.validate(params[:invoice_id], token: current_user_token)

    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  @validation = { valid: false, errors: ['Invoice ID is required for tax validation'] }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

                respond_to do |format|

    49. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

    50. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { valid: false, errors: [e.message] }, status: :unprocessable_content }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  format.turbo_stream do
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace(
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      "validation_result",
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      partial: "tax_calculations/validation_result",
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      locals: { validation: { valid: false, errors: [e.message] } }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    )
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

            class TaxRatesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def index
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                rates_response = TaxService.rates(token: current_user_token)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                exemptions_response = TaxService.exemptions(token: current_user_token)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Extract data from JSON API format
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @tax_rates = rates_response.dig('data')&.map { |rate| rate['attributes'] } || []
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @exemptions = exemptions_response.dig('data')&.map { |exemption| exemption['attributes'] } || []
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  format.html
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { tax_rates: @tax_rates, exemptions: @exemptions } }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                redirect_to root_path, alert: "Unable to load tax rates: #{e.message}"
          
      18.

              end

              def ensure_company_selected

              def ensure_admin_or_owner

              def current_user_role_in_company
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                return nil unless current_company_id && user_companies.present?

    106. 
            

            

                
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                company = user_companies.find { |c| (c['id'] || c[:id]) == current_company_id }

    108. 
            

            

                company ? (company['role'] || company[:role]) : nil

              def set_user

    112.

      114.

              def fetch_company_users

    119. 
            

            

                UserCompanyService.list_users(

    120. 
            

            

                  company_id: current_company_id,

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

      125.

              def available_roles_for_current_user
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                user_role = current_user_role_in_company
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                case user_role
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                when 'owner'
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  %w[owner admin manager accountant reviewer submitter viewer]
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                when 'admin'
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  %w[manager accountant reviewer submitter viewer]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                when 'manager'
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  %w[accountant reviewer submitter viewer]
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                else
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  []
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              end
          
      142.

            end

                # Handle different response formats

                if result.is_a?(Hash)

            class WorkflowStatesController < ApplicationController

              before_action :set_workflow_state, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      4.

      5.

              def index

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result['data'] || result[:data] || result['workflow_states'] || result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                elsif result.is_a?(Array)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                else
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Workflow States - #{@workflow_definition[:name] || @workflow_definition['name']}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Failed to load workflow states: #{e.message}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @workflow_states = []
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              def show
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                state_name = @workflow_state[:name] || @workflow_state['name']
          
      26.

                @page_title = "#{state_name.capitalize} State"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow state not found: #{e.message}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33.

              def new
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new

                @page_title = "New Workflow State"

    36.

              def create
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # Ensure workflow_id is present
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                if workflow_id.blank?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:error] = "Workflow definition ID is missing"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  @page_title = "New Workflow State"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  return
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.create_state(
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  workflow_state_params,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                )
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow state created successfully'
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Handle API response format - could be nested under 'data' or direct
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                state_data = result.is_a?(Hash) && result['data'] ? result['data'] : result
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                state_id = state_data[:id] || state_data['id'] if state_data.is_a?(Hash)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                # Always redirect to index page if state_id is missing
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                flash.now[:error] = "Failed to create workflow state: #{e.message}"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                @page_title = "New Workflow State"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71.

              def edit
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Convert API hash response to form model for the form
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                api_state = @workflow_state
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                @original_state = api_state  # Keep original for breadcrumbs and URLs
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.from_hash(api_state)
          
      76.

                @page_title = "Edit #{api_state['display_name']} State"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82.

              def update
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                original_state = @workflow_state
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                # Ensure workflow_id is present
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                if workflow_id.blank?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  @original_state = original_state
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)

    91.

      92.

    93.

      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  return
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # Extract state ID from API response (handle both string and symbol keys)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                state_id = original_state[:id] || original_state['id']
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: update - original_state: #{original_state.inspect}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: update - extracted state_id: #{state_id.inspect}"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                if state_id.blank?
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:error] = "Workflow state ID is missing"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  @original_state = original_state
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  @page_title = "Edit State"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  return
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.update_state(
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  state_id,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  workflow_state_params,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                )
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow state updated successfully'
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Always redirect to index page
          
      121.

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                @original_state = original_state  # Preserve original state for URLs and breadcrumbs
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowStateForm.new(workflow_state_params)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                flash.now[:error] = "Failed to update workflow state: #{e.message}"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                display_name = (original_state && (original_state['display_name'] || original_state[:display_name])) || 'State'
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Edit #{display_name}"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                state_id = @workflow_state[:id] || @workflow_state['id']
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                WorkflowService.delete_state(workflow_id, state_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow state deleted successfully'
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Failed to delete workflow state: #{e.message}"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              private
          
      144.
