              def set_workflow_definition
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                @workflow_definition = WorkflowService.definition(params[:workflow_definition_id], token: current_user_token)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow definition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definitions_path
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def set_workflow_state
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                @workflow_state = WorkflowService.state(
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  params[:id],
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                )
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow state not found: #{e.message}"
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_states_path(workflow_id)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              def workflow_state_params
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                # Handle both nested (:workflow_state) and flat parameter formats
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                permitted = if params[:workflow_state].present?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  params.require(:workflow_state).permit(
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    :name, :code, :category, :color, :position, :is_initial, :is_final, :display_name, :description
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  )
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                else
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  # Handle flat parameters (current form submission format)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  # Convert flat params to expected API format
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  {
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    name: params[:name],
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    code: params[:code],
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    category: params[:category],
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    description: params[:description],
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    color: params[:color],
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    position: params[:position].to_i,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    is_initial: params[:is_initial] == '1',
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    is_final: params[:is_final] == '1'
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  }.compact
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                # Convert to hash if ActionController::Parameters
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                permitted = permitted.to_h if permitted.respond_to?(:to_h)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                # Map form fields to API fields
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                if permitted[:name].present? && permitted[:display_name].blank?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  permitted[:display_name] = permitted[:name]
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                # Ensure position is a positive integer
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                if permitted[:position].blank? || permitted[:position].to_i <= 0
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  permitted[:position] = 1
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                else
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  permitted[:position] = permitted[:position].to_i
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                # Ensure code is present - generate from name if missing
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                if permitted[:code].blank? && permitted[:name].present?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  permitted[:code] = permitted[:name].to_s.downcase.gsub(/[^a-z0-9]+/, '_').gsub(/^_+|_+$/, '')
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                permitted
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            end
          
      209.

    app/controllers/workflow_transitions_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    254 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 254 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class WorkflowTransitionsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :set_workflow_definition
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :set_workflow_transition, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                transitions_result = WorkflowService.definition_transitions(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                states_result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API for transitions
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if transitions_result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transitions = transitions_result['data'] || transitions_result[:data] || transitions_result['workflow_transitions'] || transitions_result[:workflow_transitions] || []
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                elsif transitions_result.is_a?(Array)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transitions = transitions_result
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transitions = []
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API for states
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if states_result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = states_result['data'] || states_result[:data] || states_result['workflow_states'] || states_result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                elsif states_result.is_a?(Array)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = states_result
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                else
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Workflow Transitions - #{@workflow_definition[:name] || @workflow_definition['name']}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Failed to load workflow transitions: #{e.message}"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                @workflow_transitions = []
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @workflow_states = []
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def show
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result['data'] || result[:data] || result['workflow_states'] || result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                elsif result.is_a?(Array)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                @from_state = @workflow_states.find { |state| (state[:code] || state['code']) == (@workflow_transition[:from_state_code] || @workflow_transition['from_state_code']) }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @to_state = @workflow_states.find { |state| (state[:code] || state['code']) == (@workflow_transition[:to_state_code] || @workflow_transition['to_state_code']) }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @page_title = "#{@workflow_transition[:display_name] || @workflow_transition['display_name']} Transition"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              def new
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result['data'] || result[:data] || result['workflow_states'] || result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                elsif result.is_a?(Array)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  'name' => '',
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  'code' => '',
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  'display_name' => '',
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  'from_state_id' => '',
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  'to_state_id' => '',
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  'required_roles' => [],
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  'requires_comment' => false,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  'guard_conditions' => []
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                @page_title = "New Workflow Transition"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Failed to load workflow states: #{e.message}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def create
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = WorkflowService.create_transition(
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  workflow_transition_params,
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                )
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow transition created successfully'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # Load workflow states for the form
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                begin
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  states_result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  if states_result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    @workflow_states = states_result['data'] || states_result[:data] || []
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  elsif states_result.is_a?(Array)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    @workflow_states = states_result
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  else
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    @workflow_states = []
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                # Build transition hash from submitted parameters
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                transition_params = workflow_transition_params
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = {
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  'name' => transition_params[:name] || '',
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  'code' => transition_params[:code] || '',
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  'display_name' => transition_params[:display_name] || '',
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  'from_state_id' => transition_params[:from_state_id] || '',
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  'to_state_id' => transition_params[:to_state_id] || '',
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  'required_roles' => transition_params[:required_roles] || [],
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  'requires_comment' => transition_params[:requires_comment] || false,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  'guard_conditions' => transition_params[:guard_conditions] || []
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                }
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                flash.now[:error] = "Failed to create workflow transition: #{e.message}"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                @page_title = "New Workflow Transition"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                render :new, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              def edit
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result['data'] || result[:data] || result['workflow_states'] || result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                elsif result.is_a?(Array)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                else
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Edit #{@workflow_transition[:display_name] || @workflow_transition['display_name']} Transition"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow transition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              def update
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = WorkflowService.update_transition(
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transition[:id] || @workflow_transition['id'],
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  workflow_transition_params,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                )
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow transition updated successfully'
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.definition_states(workflow_id, token: current_user_token)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats from API
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                if result.is_a?(Hash)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result['data'] || result[:data] || result['workflow_states'] || result[:workflow_states] || []
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                elsif result.is_a?(Array)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = result
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                else
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  @workflow_states = []
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                flash.now[:error] = "Failed to update workflow transition: #{e.message}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                @page_title = "Edit #{@workflow_transition[:display_name] || @workflow_transition['display_name']} Transition"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                render :edit, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                WorkflowService.delete_transition(
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  @workflow_transition[:id] || @workflow_transition['id'],
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                )
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = 'Workflow transition deleted successfully'
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Failed to delete workflow transition: #{e.message}"
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              private
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              def set_workflow_definition
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                @workflow_definition = WorkflowService.definition(params[:workflow_definition_id], token: current_user_token)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow definition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definitions_path
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def set_workflow_transition
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                @workflow_transition = WorkflowService.get_transition(
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  workflow_id,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  params[:id],
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                )
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                flash[:error] = "Workflow transition not found: #{e.message}"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                workflow_id = @workflow_definition[:id] || @workflow_definition['id']
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                redirect_to workflow_definition_workflow_transitions_path(workflow_id)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218.

              def workflow_transition_params
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                # Handle both nested (:workflow_transition) and flat parameter formats
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                # Check if workflow_transition contains the main form fields (not just guard_conditions)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                permitted = if params[:workflow_transition].present? &&
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                               (params[:workflow_transition].key?(:display_name) || params[:workflow_transition].key?('display_name') ||
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                                params[:workflow_transition].key?(:name) || params[:workflow_transition].key?('name'))
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  # Standard form submission with nested parameters
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  params.require(:workflow_transition).permit(
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    :name, :code, :display_name, :from_state_id, :to_state_id, :requires_comment,
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    required_roles: [], guard_conditions: []
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  )
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                else
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  # Handle flat parameters or mixed format (including when workflow_transition only has certain keys)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  nested_params = params[:workflow_transition] || {}
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  {
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    name: params[:name],
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    display_name: params[:display_name],
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                    code: params[:code],
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                    from_state_id: params[:from_state_id],
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    to_state_id: params[:to_state_id],
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    requires_comment: params[:requires_comment] == '1',
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    required_roles: params[:required_roles] || [],
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    guard_conditions: nested_params[:guard_conditions] || params[:guard_conditions] || []
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  }
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                # Convert to hash if ActionController::Parameters
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                permitted = permitted.to_h if permitted.respond_to?(:to_h)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                # Ensure name is present - use display_name if missing
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                if permitted[:name].blank? && permitted[:display_name].present?
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  permitted[:name] = permitted[:display_name]
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                # Ensure code is present - generate from name if missing
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                if permitted[:code].blank? && permitted[:name].present?
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  permitted[:code] = permitted[:name].to_s.downcase.gsub(/[^a-z0-9]+/, '_').gsub(/^_+|_+$/, '')
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                # Handle state IDs properly - convert empty strings to nil for from_state, but keep to_state as required
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                if permitted[:from_state_id].blank? || permitted[:from_state_id] == 'any'
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  permitted[:from_state_id] = nil
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                # For to_state_id, convert empty to nil but this will be caught by API validation
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                if permitted[:to_state_id].blank?
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  permitted[:to_state_id] = nil
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                # Handle arrays - ensure they're arrays and remove blanks
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                [:required_roles, :guard_conditions].each do |key|
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  value = permitted[key]
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  if value.is_a?(Array)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    permitted[key] = value.reject(&:blank?)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  elsif value.is_a?(String)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    permitted[key] = value.split(',').map(&:strip).reject(&:blank?)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  else
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                    permitted[key] = []
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                # Remove nil values except for from_state_id which can be nil
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                permitted.compact.merge(
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  permitted[:from_state_id].nil? ? { from_state_id: nil } : {}
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                )
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

              end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

              private
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

            
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

              def parse_array_param(param)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                case param
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                when Array then param.reject(&:blank?)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                when ActionController::Parameters then param.to_a.reject(&:blank?)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                when String then param.split(',').map(&:strip).reject(&:blank?)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                else []
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                end
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

              end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

            
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

              def parse_json_param(param)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                case param
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                when Hash then param
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                when Array then param
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                when String
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  return {} if param.blank?
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                    JSON.parse(param)
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  rescue JSON::ParserError
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                    {}
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                else
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  param.respond_to?(:empty?) && param.empty? ? [] : {}
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

              end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

            end
          
      312.

    0.0% lines covered

    167 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 167 lines missed.

            class WorkflowsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :load_invoice, except: [:bulk_transition]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :load_history, only: [:show]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6.

              def show
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                begin
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  response = WorkflowService.available_transitions(
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    @invoice[:id],
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    token: current_user_token
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  )
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Transform the API response into the format expected by the view
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if response && response[:available_transitions]
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    @available_transitions = response[:available_transitions].map do |transition_data|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      {
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        to_status: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :code) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'code'),
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        to_status_name: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :name) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'name'),
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        description: transition_data.dig(:transition, :description) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'description'),
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        requires_comment: transition_data.dig(:transition, :requires_comment) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'requires_comment') || false
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  elsif response.is_a?(Array)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    @available_transitions = response
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    @available_transitions = []
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  @available_transitions = []
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = "Failed to load workflow transitions: #{e.message}"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]) and return
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  format.html

    37.

              end
          
      39.

      40.

              def transition
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                result = WorkflowService.transition(
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  @invoice[:id],
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  status: params[:status],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  comment: params[:comment],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  token: current_user_token
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                )
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  format.html do
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), 
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                                notice: "Invoice status updated to #{params[:status]}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  format.turbo_stream do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    @invoice = InvoiceService.find(@invoice[:id], token: current_user_token)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    @history = WorkflowService.history(token: current_user_token, params: { invoice_id: @invoice[:id] })
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    # Ensure current workflow state is included in @invoice data
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    if @invoice[:has_workflow] && !@invoice[:current_state]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      # If the API didn't return current workflow state, we need to get it
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      # For now, we'll use a fallback approach by checking available transitions
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      current_response = WorkflowService.available_transitions(@invoice[:id], token: current_user_token)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      if current_response && current_response[:current_state]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        @invoice[:current_state] = current_response[:current_state][:code]
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        @invoice[:current_state_name] = current_response[:current_state][:name]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    # Get available transitions and transform them
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    response = WorkflowService.available_transitions(
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      @invoice[:id],
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      token: current_user_token
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    )
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    # Transform the API response into the format expected by the view
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    if response && response[:available_transitions]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      @available_transitions = response[:available_transitions].map do |transition_data|
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                        {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                          to_status: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :code) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'code'),
          
      79.

                          to_status_name: transition_data.dig(:to_state, :name) || transition_data.dig('to_state', 'name'),
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                          description: transition_data.dig(:transition, :description) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'description'),
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          requires_comment: transition_data.dig(:transition, :requires_comment) || transition_data.dig('transition', 'requires_comment') || false
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    elsif response.is_a?(Array)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      @available_transitions = response
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86.

      87.

                      @available_transitions = []

    89. 
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  format.html do
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    redirect_to invoice_path(@invoice[:id]), 
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                                alert: e.errors.join(', ')
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  format.turbo_stream do
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace(
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      "workflow_errors",
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      partial: "shared/errors",
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      locals: { errors: e.errors }
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    )
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|

                  format.html do

      109.
