              def bulk_transition
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                unless params[:invoice_ids].present? && params[:status].present?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Please select invoices and specify a status"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  return
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                invoice_ids = params[:invoice_ids].reject(&:blank?).map(&:to_i)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                if invoice_ids.empty?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Please select at least one invoice"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  return
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                begin
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  result = WorkflowService.bulk_transition(
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    invoice_ids,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    status: params[:status],
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    comment: params[:comment],
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    token: current_user_token
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  )
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  success_count = result['success_count'] || invoice_ids.size
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = "Successfully updated #{success_count} invoice(s) to #{params[:status]}"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  if result['errors'] && result['errors'].any?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    flash[:warning] = "Some invoices could not be updated: #{result['errors'].join(', ')}"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ValidationError => e
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  error_message = case e.errors
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                                  when Array
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                                    e.errors.join(', ')
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                                  when Hash
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                                    e.errors.values.flatten.join(', ')
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                                  else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                                    e.message
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  flash[:error] = "Validation error: #{error_message}"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  flash[:error] = "Failed to update invoices: #{e.message}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                redirect_to invoices_path
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              private
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              def load_invoice
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                @invoice = InvoiceService.find(params[:invoice_id], token: current_user_token)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                if e.message.include?("not found") || e.message.include?("Not found")
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Invoice not found"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                else
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  redirect_to invoices_path, alert: "Failed to load invoice: #{e.message}"
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              def load_history
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                response = WorkflowService.history(token: current_user_token, params: { invoice_id: @invoice[:id] })
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # Handle different response formats
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                if response.is_a?(Array)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  @history = response
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                elsif response && response[:data]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  @history = response[:data]
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                elsif response && response[:history]
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  @history = response[:history]
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                else
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  @history = []
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              rescue ApiService::ApiError => e
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                @history = []
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to load workflow history: #{e.message}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            end
          
      195.

    app/helpers/application_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    147 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 147 lines missed.

            module ApplicationHelper

              def number_with_delimiter(number, delimiter: ',')
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                return '' if number.nil?
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                parts = number.to_s.split('.')
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                parts[0].gsub!(/(\d)(?=(\d\d\d)+(?!\d))/, "\\1#{delimiter}")
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                parts.join('.')
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def format_currency(amount, currency = '€')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                return '-' if amount.nil?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                "#{number_with_delimiter(sprintf('%.2f', amount))} #{currency}"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              def format_percentage(percentage)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                return '-' if percentage.nil?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                "#{sprintf('%.2f', percentage)}%"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def format_date(date)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                return '-' if date.nil?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                Date.parse(date.to_s).strftime('%B %d, %Y')
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                date.to_s
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              
          
      26.

              def status_badge_class(status)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                base_classes = "inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                case status.to_s.downcase
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                when 'draft'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                when 'sent'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-blue-100 text-blue-800"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                when 'viewed'
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-purple-100 text-purple-800"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                when 'partial'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                when 'paid'
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-green-100 text-green-800"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                when 'overdue'
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-red-100 text-red-800"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                when 'cancelled'
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                when 'frozen'
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-800"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  "#{base_classes} bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def breadcrumb(*items)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                content_for :breadcrumb do
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  content_tag :nav, class: "flex mb-6", "aria-label": "Breadcrumb" do
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    content_tag :ol, class: "inline-flex items-center space-x-1 md:space-x-3" do
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      items.map.with_index do |item, index|
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        if index == items.length - 1
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                          # Last item (current page)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                          content_tag :li, class: "inline-flex items-center" do
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                            content_tag :span, item.is_a?(Array) ? item.first : item, 
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                              class: "text-sm font-medium text-gray-700"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                          end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        else
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          # Linkable items
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                          content_tag :li, class: "inline-flex items-center" do
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                            if item.is_a?(Array)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                              link = link_to item.first, item.last, 
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                                class: "inline-flex items-center text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-indigo-600"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                              if index > 0
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                                chevron = content_tag :svg, class: "w-3 h-3 text-gray-400 mx-1", fill: "currentColor", viewBox: "0 0 20 20" do
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                                  content_tag :path, nil, "fill-rule": "evenodd", 
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                                    d: "M7.293 14.707a1 1 0 010-1.414L10.586 10 7.293 6.707a1 1 0 011.414-1.414l4 4a1 1 0 010 1.414l-4 4a1 1 0 01-1.414 0z",
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                                    "clip-rule": "evenodd"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                                chevron + link
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                              else
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                                link
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                              end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                            else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                              if index > 0
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                                chevron = content_tag :svg, class: "w-3 h-3 text-gray-400 mx-1", fill: "currentColor", viewBox: "0 0 20 20" do
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                                  content_tag :path, nil, "fill-rule": "evenodd",
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                                    d: "M7.293 14.707a1 1 0 010-1.414L10.586 10 7.293 6.707a1 1 0 011.414-1.414l4 4a1 1 0 010 1.414l-4 4a1 1 0 01-1.414 0z",
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                                    "clip-rule": "evenodd"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                                chevron + content_tag(:span, item, class: "text-sm font-medium text-gray-700")
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                              else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                                content_tag :span, item, class: "text-sm font-medium text-gray-700"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                            end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                          end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      end.join.html_safe
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              def flash_class(type)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                case type.to_s
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                when 'notice', 'success'
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  'bg-green-50 text-green-800 border-green-200'
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                when 'alert', 'error'
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  'bg-red-50 text-red-800 border-red-200'
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                when 'warning'
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  'bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200'
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  'bg-blue-50 text-blue-800 border-blue-200'
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              def flash_icon(type)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                case type.to_s
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                when 'notice', 'success'
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  '<svg class="h-5 w-5 text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20">
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd"/>
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  </svg>'
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                when 'alert', 'error'
          
      125.

      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zM8.707 7.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414L8.586 10l-1.293 1.293a1 1 0 101.414 1.414L10 11.414l1.293 1.293a1 1 0 001.414-1.414L11.414 10l1.293-1.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L10 8.586 8.707 7.293z" clip-rule="evenodd"/>
          
      127.

                  </svg>'

      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  </svg>'
          
      132.

                else

              # Helper to add error styling to form fields
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              def field_class(field_name, base_classes, errors = nil)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                classes = base_classes
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                if errors && errors[field_name.to_s]
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  # Add error styling: red border and red focus ring
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  classes = classes.gsub('border-gray-300', 'border-red-300')
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  classes = classes.gsub('focus:border-indigo-500', 'focus:border-red-500')
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  classes = classes.gsub('focus:ring-indigo-500', 'focus:ring-red-500')
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                else
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  # Ensure default styling
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  unless classes.include?('border-')
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    classes += ' border-gray-300'
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  unless classes.include?('focus:border-')
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    classes += ' focus:border-indigo-500'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                classes
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              # Helper to access hash values with both symbol and string keys
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def safe_access(hash, key)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                return nil unless hash.is_a?(Hash)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                hash[key.to_sym] || hash[key.to_s]
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            end
          
      167.

            module PaginationHelper

              def paginate(collection, options = {})
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                render 'shared/pagination', {
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  collection: collection,
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  param_name: options[:param_name] || :page,
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  window: options[:window] || 2
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                }
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

    10. 
            

            

              def page_entries_info(collection)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if collection.total_count.zero?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  "No entries found"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                else
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  from = (collection.current_page - 1) * collection.limit_value + 1
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  to = [from + collection.size - 1, collection.total_count].min
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  "Showing <b>#{from}</b> to <b>#{to}</b> of <b>#{collection.total_count}</b> entries".html_safe
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            end
          
      21.

            module WorkflowHelper

              def sla_status_class(invoice_workflow)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                return '' unless invoice_workflow.present? && has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                if sla_overdue?(invoice_workflow)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  'text-red-600 bg-red-100'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                elsif sla_warning?(invoice_workflow)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                else
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  'text-green-600 bg-green-100'
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14.

              def sla_status_text(invoice_workflow)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                return 'No SLA' unless invoice_workflow.present? && has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                if sla_overdue?(invoice_workflow)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  time_overdue = time_since_deadline(invoice_workflow)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  "Overdue by #{time_overdue}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                elsif sla_warning?(invoice_workflow)
          
      21.

      26.

              def sla_icon(invoice_workflow)

                return 'clock' unless invoice_workflow.present?

              def time_in_current_state(invoice_workflow)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                return 'Unknown' unless invoice_workflow&.dig('entered_current_state_at')
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                entered_at = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['entered_current_state_at'])
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - entered_at
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                format_duration(duration)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49.

      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              def sla_progress_percentage(invoice_workflow)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                return 0 unless invoice_workflow.present? && has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                entered_at = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['entered_current_state_at'])
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                now = Time.current
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                total_duration = deadline - entered_at
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                elapsed_duration = now - entered_at
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                return 100 if elapsed_duration >= total_duration
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                percentage = (elapsed_duration / total_duration * 100).round
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                [0, [percentage, 100].min].max
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              def sla_deadline_formatted(invoice_workflow)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                return nil unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                deadline.strftime("%b %d, %Y at %I:%M %p")
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73.

              private
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              def sla_overdue?(invoice_workflow)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                return false unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                Time.current > deadline
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              def sla_warning?(invoice_workflow)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return false unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                warning_threshold = deadline - 2.hours # Warning 2 hours before deadline
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                Time.current > warning_threshold && Time.current <= deadline
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                invoice_workflow&.dig('sla_deadline').present?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              def time_until_deadline(invoice_workflow)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                return 'No deadline' unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                duration = deadline - Time.current
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                return 'Overdue' if duration < 0
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                format_duration(duration)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def time_since_deadline(invoice_workflow)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                return 'No deadline' unless has_sla_deadline?(invoice_workflow)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                deadline = Time.parse(invoice_workflow['sla_deadline'])
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - deadline
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                return 'Not overdue' if duration < 0
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                format_duration(duration)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              def format_duration(duration_seconds)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                return '0 minutes' if duration_seconds <= 0
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                days = duration_seconds / 1.day
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                hours = (duration_seconds % 1.day) / 1.hour
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                minutes = (duration_seconds % 1.hour) / 1.minute
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                parts = []
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                parts << "#{days.to_i} day#{'s' if days != 1}" if days >= 1
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                parts << "#{hours.to_i} hour#{'s' if hours != 1}" if hours >= 1
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                parts << "#{minutes.to_i} minute#{'s' if minutes != 1}" if minutes >= 1
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # If we have no parts, it's less than a minute
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                return 'Less than 1 minute' if parts.empty?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                # Join parts with commas, but only show first two for readability
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                parts.take(2).join(', ')
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            end
          
      136.

              def self.validate_params(params)

    28. 
            

            

                validator = new(params)

              def self.validate_zipcode(post_code, country_code)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: "Post code is required" } if post_code.blank?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: "Country code is required" } if country_code.blank?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Convert 3-letter country code to 2-letter if needed
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                country_code_2 = new.send(:convert_to_alpha2, country_code)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: "Invalid country code" } if country_code_2.nil?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                if ValidatesZipcode.valid?(post_code, country_code_2)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  { valid: true, formatted: ValidatesZipcode.format(post_code, country_code_2) }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                else
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  { valid: false, error: "Invalid postal code for #{country_code}" }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47.

              private

                }
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                # If it's already 2 letters, return as is
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                return country_code.upcase if country_code.length == 2
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # Otherwise convert from 3-letter to 2-letter
          
      130.

                country_mapping[country_code.upcase]
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            end

                def get(endpoint, token: nil, params: {})

                def authenticated_request(method, endpoint, token: nil, body: nil, query: nil)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  options = build_request_options(token: token, body: body, query: query)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  url = "#{BASE_URL}#{endpoint}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "API Request: #{method.upcase} #{url}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "API Request Body: #{body.inspect}" if body
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "API Request Headers: #{options[:headers].inspect}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  response = HTTParty.send(method, url, options)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "API Response Code: #{response.code}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "API Response Body (first 500 chars): #{response.body.to_s[0..500]}" if response.body
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  handle_response(response)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                rescue HTTParty::Error => e
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "API Request Failed: #{e.message}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  raise ApiError, "Network error: #{e.message}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                rescue AuthenticationError, ValidationError => e
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  # Re-raise our own exceptions without wrapping
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  raise e
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Unexpected error: #{e.message}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  raise ApiError, "Unexpected error: #{e.message}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
              1
            

            

                def build_request_options(token: nil, body: nil, query: nil)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  options = {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    headers: {
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      'Accept' => 'application/json'
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  options[:headers]['Authorization'] = "Bearer #{token}" if token
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  options[:body] = body.to_json if body
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  options[:query] = query if query
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  options
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
              1
            

            

                def handle_response(response)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  case response.code
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  when 200..299
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    parse_response_body(response)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  when 401
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    raise AuthenticationError, 'Authentication failed. Please login again.'
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  when 403
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    raise ApiError, 'You do not have permission to perform this action.'
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  when 404
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    raise ApiError, 'The requested resource was not found.'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  when 422
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: ApiService - 422 response body: #{response.body}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    errors = parse_validation_errors(response)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: ApiService - parsed errors: #{errors.inspect}"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    raise ValidationError.new('Validation failed', errors)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  when 500..599
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    raise ApiError, 'Server error. Please try again later.'
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    raise ApiError, "Unexpected response: #{response.code} - #{response.message}"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
              1
            

            

                def parse_response_body(response)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  return nil if response.body.blank?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  parsed = JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  parsed.is_a?(Hash) ? parsed.deep_symbolize_keys : parsed
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to parse response JSON: #{e.message}"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  response.body
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              1
            

            

                def parse_validation_errors(response)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  body = parse_response_body(response)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  return {} unless body.is_a?(Hash)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  # Now that parse_response_body returns symbolized keys, we can use symbol access
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  body[:errors] || body[:error] || {}
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  {}
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            end
          
      125.

    app/services/auth_service.rb
