            class AuthService < ApiService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def login(email, password, company_id = nil, remember_me = false)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService.login called with email=#{email}, company_id=#{company_id}"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  response = post('/auth/login', body: {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    grant_type: 'password',
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    email: email,
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    password: password,
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    company_id: company_id,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    remember_me: remember_me
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  })
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService.login got response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if response && response[:access_token] && response[:refresh_token]
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    # Extract user/client information from the response
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    client_info = response[:client] || response[:user]
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    result = {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      access_token: response[:access_token],
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      refresh_token: response[:refresh_token],
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      user: client_info,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      company_id: client_info&.[](:company_id),
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      companies: client_info&.[](:companies) || []
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService.login returning: #{result.inspect}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    result
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: AuthService.login failed - response was invalid"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: response present: #{response.present?}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: access_token present: #{response&.[](:access_token).present?}"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "DEBUG: refresh_token present: #{response&.[](:refresh_token).present?}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::AuthenticationError, 'Invalid login response from server'
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                def refresh_token(refresh_token)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  response = post('/auth/refresh', body: {
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    refresh_token: refresh_token
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  })
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  if response && response[:access_token]
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      access_token: response[:access_token],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      refresh_token: response[:refresh_token] || refresh_token
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  else
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::AuthenticationError, 'Failed to refresh token'
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                def logout(token)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  response = post('/auth/logout', token: token)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  response || { message: 'Logged out successfully' }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                rescue ApiService::AuthenticationError => e
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # Even if logout fails on server, clear local session
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Logout failed: #{e.message}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  raise e
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                rescue => e

                def validate_token(token)

    64. 
            

            

                  return { valid: false } if token.blank?

      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  { valid: true, user: response }

                def switch_company(token, company_id)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: AuthService.switch_company called with company_id=#{company_id}"

    79. 
            

            

                  response = post('/auth/switch_company', token: token, body: {

                    company_id: company_id
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  })
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  if response && response[:access_token]

    84. 
            

            

                    client_info = response[:client] || response[:user]
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    {
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      access_token: response[:access_token],
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87.

      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      user: client_info,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      company_id: client_info&.[](:company_id),
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90.

    91.

    92.

                  end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end

                def all(company_id:, contact_id:, token:)

      7.

                  if response[:data] && response[:data].is_a?(Array)

                def transform_address_type_display(address_type)

    88. 
            

            

                  case address_type

    90.

    91.

    92.

      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

    95.

    96.

                def transform_address(address_hash)

                def format_address_for_api(params)

      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120.

            class CompanyContactService < ApiService

                # Get all company contacts for a specific company

                def all(company_id:, token:, filters: {})

    7.

                def transform_contact_response(contact_data)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  attributes = contact_data[:attributes] || {}
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  {
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    id: contact_data[:id],
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    company_name: attributes[:company_name] || attributes[:legal_name],
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    legal_name: attributes[:legal_name],
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    tax_id: attributes[:tax_id],
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    email: attributes[:email],
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    phone: attributes[:phone],
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    contact_person: attributes[:contact_person],
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    is_active: attributes[:is_active],
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    owner_company_id: attributes[:owner_company_id],
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    # Address info if available
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    street_address: attributes[:street_address],
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    city: attributes[:city],
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    postal_code: attributes[:postal_code],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    state_province: attributes[:state_province],
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    country_code: attributes[:country_code],
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84.

      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87.

      88.

                def format_for_api(params)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  {
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    data: {
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      type: 'company_contacts',
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      attributes: params
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  }
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                end

                def all(company_id:, token:, params: {})
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  response = get("/companies/#{company_id}/contacts", token: token, params: params)

    5. 
            

            

                  
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  contacts = []

    8. 
            

            

                  if response[:data].is_a?(Array)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

      10.

      15.

                # Get active contacts for a company (useful for invoice creation)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                def active_contacts(company_id:, token:)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  response = get("/companies/#{company_id}/contacts", token: token, params: { filter: { is_active: true } })
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  contacts = []
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  if response[:data].is_a?(Array)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    contacts = response[:data].map do |contact_data|
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      attributes = contact_data[:attributes] || {}
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      # Use person_name if available, fallback to name
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                      name = attributes[:person_name] || attributes[:name]
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      # Construct full name from name parts
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                      name_parts = [
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                        attributes[:person_name] || attributes[:name],
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                        attributes[:first_surname],
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        attributes[:second_surname]
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                      ].compact.reject(&:empty?)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                      full_name = name_parts.join(' ')
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        id: contact_data[:id].to_i,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        name: name,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                        email: attributes[:email],
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                        phone: attributes[:telephone] || attributes[:phone],
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                        full_name: full_name
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  contacts
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162.

    163. 
            

            

              end

            class InvoiceNumberingService < ApiService

              class << self
          
      3.

                # Get next available invoice numbers for a given year and series type
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                def next_available(token:, year:, series_type:)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  params = {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    year: year,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    series_type: series_type
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  }
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  response = get('/invoice_numbering/next_available', token: token, params: params)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  return {} unless response
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  response.dig(:data, :attributes) || {}
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14.

                # Assign a number to an invoice

                def assign(token:, invoice_id:, series_code:, year:)

                      attributes: {

                        invoice_id: invoice_id,
          
      22.

                        series_code: series_code,

                        year: year
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

      25.

                    }

                  }

      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  response[:data]

            class InvoiceSeriesService < ApiService

    2. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                # Get all invoice series for the current company
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                def all(token:, filters: {})
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  params = {}
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  params[:year] = filters[:year] if filters[:year].present?
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  params[:series_type] = filters[:series_type] if filters[:series_type].present?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  params[:active_only] = filters[:active_only] if filters[:active_only].present?
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  response = get('/invoice_series', token: token, params: params)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  response.dig(:data, :attributes, :series) || []
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14.

    16.

    35. 
            

            

                  true

                rescue ApiService::ApiError => e

            class InvoiceService < ApiService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def all(token:, filters: {})
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  response = get('/invoices', token: token, params: filters)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.all - Raw API response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  if response[:data] && response[:data].is_a?(Array)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    invoices = response[:data].map do |invoice_data|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                      attributes = invoice_data[:attributes] || {}
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                      {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                        id: invoice_data[:id],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                        invoice_number: attributes[:invoice_number],
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                        invoice_series_id: attributes[:invoice_series_id],
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                        proforma_number: attributes[:proforma_number],
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                        document_type: attributes[:document_type],
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        invoice_type: attributes[:document_type], # alias for compatibility
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        status: attributes[:status],
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        date: attributes[:issue_date],
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        issue_date: attributes[:issue_date], # alias for compatibility  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                        due_date: attributes[:due_date],
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        seller_party_id: attributes[:seller_party_id],
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        buyer_party_id: attributes[:buyer_party_id],
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                        buyer_company_contact_id: attributes[:buyer_company_contact_id],
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                        total_invoice: attributes[:total_invoice],
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        total: attributes[:total_invoice]&.to_f, # Field used by views for display
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                        subtotal: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes]&.to_f, # Subtotal calculation
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                        total_tax: attributes[:total_tax_outputs]&.to_f, # Tax amount
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                        currency_code: attributes[:currency_code],
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                        language_code: attributes[:language_code],
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        notes: attributes[:notes],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                        internal_notes: attributes[:internal_notes],
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        is_frozen: attributes[:is_frozen],
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                        frozen_at: attributes[:frozen_at],
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35.

      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        is_proforma: attributes[:is_proforma],
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        can_be_modified: attributes[:can_be_modified],
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                        can_be_converted: attributes[:can_be_converted],
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                        # Additional fields from API that might be used by views
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                        total_gross_amount: attributes[:total_gross_amount],
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                        total_gross_amount_before_taxes: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        total_tax_outputs: attributes[:total_tax_outputs],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        total_tax_withheld: attributes[:total_tax_withheld],
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        total_outstanding_amount: attributes[:total_outstanding_amount],
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        exchange_rate: attributes[:exchange_rate],
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        # Additional fields that might be missing
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        payment_terms: attributes[:payment_terms],
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        payment_method: attributes[:payment_method],
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        # Company name from API response
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        company_name: attributes[:buyer_name],
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        # Workflow functionality
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        workflow_definition_id: attributes[:workflow_definition_id]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    result = {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      invoices: invoices,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      meta: response[:meta] || {},
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      total: response[:meta] ? response[:meta][:total] : invoices.length
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    }
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.all - Transformed response: #{result.inspect}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    result
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.all - No data field or not an array, returning raw response"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    response
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                def find(id, token:)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  response = get("/invoices/#{id}?include=invoice_lines,invoice_taxes", token: token)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - Raw API response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  if response[:data]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    attributes = response[:data][:attributes] || {}
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    # Workaround: If invoice_series_id is nil, try to infer it from invoice number prefix
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    invoice_series_id = attributes[:invoice_series_id]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    if invoice_series_id.nil? && attributes[:invoice_number].present?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      case attributes[:invoice_number]
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      when /^FC-/
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        invoice_series_id = "72" # FC - Facturas Comerciales 2025
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      when /^PF-/
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        invoice_series_id = "74" # PF - Proforma 2025
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    transformed = {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      id: response[:data][:id],
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      invoice_number: attributes[:invoice_number],
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      invoice_series_id: invoice_series_id,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      proforma_number: attributes[:proforma_number],
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      document_type: attributes[:document_type],
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      invoice_type: attributes[:document_type], # alias for compatibility
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      status: attributes[:status],
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      date: attributes[:issue_date],
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      issue_date: attributes[:issue_date], # alias for compatibility
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      due_date: attributes[:due_date],
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      seller_party_id: attributes[:seller_party_id],
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      buyer_party_id: attributes[:buyer_party_id],
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      buyer_company_contact_id: attributes[:buyer_company_contact_id],
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      total_invoice: attributes[:total_invoice],
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      total: attributes[:total_invoice]&.to_f, # Field used by views for display
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      subtotal: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes]&.to_f, # Subtotal calculation
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      total_tax: attributes[:total_tax_outputs]&.to_f, # Tax amount
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      currency_code: attributes[:currency_code],
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      language_code: attributes[:language_code],
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      notes: attributes[:notes],
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      internal_notes: attributes[:internal_notes],
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      is_frozen: attributes[:is_frozen],
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      frozen_at: attributes[:frozen_at],
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      display_number: attributes[:display_number],
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      is_proforma: attributes[:is_proforma],
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      can_be_modified: attributes[:can_be_modified],
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      can_be_converted: attributes[:can_be_converted],
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      # Additional fields from API that might be used by views
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      total_gross_amount: attributes[:total_gross_amount],
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      total_gross_amount_before_taxes: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes],
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      total_tax_outputs: attributes[:total_tax_outputs],
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      total_tax_withheld: attributes[:total_tax_withheld],
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      total_outstanding_amount: attributes[:total_outstanding_amount],
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      exchange_rate: attributes[:exchange_rate],
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      # Additional fields that might be missing
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      payment_terms: attributes[:payment_terms],
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      payment_method: attributes[:payment_method],
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      workflow_definition_id: attributes[:workflow_definition_id],
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      # Global financial fields
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                      total_general_discounts: attributes[:total_general_discounts],
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      total_general_surcharges: attributes[:total_general_surcharges],
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      total_financial_expenses: attributes[:total_financial_expenses],
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      total_reimbursable_expenses: attributes[:total_reimbursable_expenses],
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      withholding_amount: attributes[:withholding_amount],
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      payment_in_kind_amount: attributes[:payment_in_kind_amount],
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      invoice_lines: response[:included]&.select { |item| item[:type] == 'invoice_lines' }&.map do |line|
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                        line_attrs = line[:attributes] || {}
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                        quantity = line_attrs[:quantity].to_f
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                        unit_price = line_attrs[:unit_price_without_tax].to_f
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        {
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                          id: line[:id],
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                          line_number: line_attrs[:line_number],
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                          description: line_attrs[:item_description],
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                          item_description: line_attrs[:item_description], # For view compatibility
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                          quantity: quantity,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                          unit_price: unit_price,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                          unit_price_without_tax: unit_price, # For view compatibility
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                          tax_rate: 21.0, # Default tax rate (could be computed from invoice_taxes)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                          discount_percentage: line_attrs[:discount_rate] || 0,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                          discount_rate: line_attrs[:discount_rate], # For view compatibility
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                          gross_amount: line_attrs[:gross_amount],
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                          total: line_attrs[:gross_amount] || (quantity * unit_price),
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                          product_code: line_attrs[:article_code] # Map article_code to product_code for client compatibility
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                        }
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      end || []
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - Transformed invoice: #{transformed.inspect}"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - Transformed invoice[:id]: #{transformed[:id].inspect} (#{transformed[:id].class})"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    transformed
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.find - No data field in response, returning raw response"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    response
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                def create(params, token:)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  # Convert to JSON API format (line items are now handled by the backend automatically)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  json_api_params = format_for_api(params)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  response = post('/invoices', token: token, body: json_api_params)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  response
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                def update(id, params, token:)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  # Convert to JSON API format
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  json_api_params = format_for_api(params)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  response = put("/invoices/#{id}", token: token, body: json_api_params)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  # Apply same transformation as find method
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  if response[:data]
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    attributes = response[:data][:attributes] || {}
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    invoice_series_id = attributes[:invoice_series_id]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    if invoice_series_id.nil? && attributes[:invoice_number].present?
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      case attributes[:invoice_number]
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      when /^FC-/
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                        invoice_series_id = "72" # FC - Facturas Comerciales 2025
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      when /^PF-/
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                        invoice_series_id = "74" # PF - Proforma 2025
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                      end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    transformed = {
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      id: response[:data][:id],
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      invoice_number: attributes[:invoice_number],
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                      invoice_series_id: invoice_series_id,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                      proforma_number: attributes[:proforma_number],
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                      document_type: attributes[:document_type],
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      invoice_type: attributes[:document_type], # alias for compatibility
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      status: attributes[:status],
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                      date: attributes[:issue_date],
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      issue_date: attributes[:issue_date], # alias for compatibility
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      due_date: attributes[:due_date],
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      seller_party_id: attributes[:seller_party_id],
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                      buyer_party_id: attributes[:buyer_party_id],
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      buyer_company_contact_id: attributes[:buyer_company_contact_id],
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                      total_invoice: attributes[:total_invoice],
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                      total: attributes[:total_invoice]&.to_f, # Field used by views for display
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      subtotal: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes]&.to_f, # Subtotal calculation
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      total_tax: attributes[:total_tax_outputs]&.to_f, # Tax amount
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      currency_code: attributes[:currency_code],
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      language_code: attributes[:language_code],
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                      notes: attributes[:notes],
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      internal_notes: attributes[:internal_notes],
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      is_frozen: attributes[:is_frozen],
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      frozen_at: attributes[:frozen_at],
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      display_number: attributes[:display_number],
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                      is_proforma: attributes[:is_proforma],
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                      created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                      updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      can_be_modified: attributes[:can_be_modified],
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                      can_be_converted: attributes[:can_be_converted],
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      # Additional fields from API that might be used by views
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                      total_gross_amount: attributes[:total_gross_amount],
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      total_gross_amount_before_taxes: attributes[:total_gross_amount_before_taxes],
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      total_tax_outputs: attributes[:total_tax_outputs],
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                      total_tax_withheld: attributes[:total_tax_withheld],
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      total_outstanding_amount: attributes[:total_outstanding_amount],
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                      exchange_rate: attributes[:exchange_rate],
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                      # Additional fields that might be missing
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                      payment_terms: attributes[:payment_terms],
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                      payment_method: attributes[:payment_method],
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                      workflow_definition_id: attributes[:workflow_definition_id],
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      # Global financial fields
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      total_general_discounts: attributes[:total_general_discounts],
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                      total_general_surcharges: attributes[:total_general_surcharges],
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                      total_financial_expenses: attributes[:total_financial_expenses],
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                      total_reimbursable_expenses: attributes[:total_reimbursable_expenses],
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                      withholding_amount: attributes[:withholding_amount],
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                      payment_in_kind_amount: attributes[:payment_in_kind_amount]
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    }
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.update - Transformed invoice: #{transformed.inspect}"
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: InvoiceService.update - Transformed invoice[:id]: #{transformed[:id].inspect} (#{transformed[:id].class})"
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                    return transformed
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  else
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    response
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                def delete(id, token:)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  super("/invoices/#{id}", token: token)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                end
          
      255.

                def remove_line_item(invoice_id, line_id, token:)

                rescue => e

                def recent(token:, limit: 5)

                private
