                # Special method for downloading files (PDF, XML) that are not JSON
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                def download_file(endpoint, token:)
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  options = {
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                    headers: {
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                      'Authorization' => "Bearer #{token}",
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                      'Accept' => '*/*'
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                    }
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                  }
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                  
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  url = "#{ApiService::BASE_URL}#{endpoint}"
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                  response = HTTParty.get(url, options)
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                  
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                  case response.code
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                  when 200
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                    response.body
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                  when 401
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::AuthenticationError, 'Authentication failed'
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                  when 404
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::ApiError, 'Resource not found'
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                  else
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                    raise ApiService::ApiError, "Request failed with status: #{response.code}"
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                  end
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                rescue HTTParty::Error => e
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                  raise ApiService::ApiError, "Network error: #{e.message}"
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                end
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                # Convert flat hash to JSON API format
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                def format_for_api(params)
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                  # Don't modify original params, work with a copy
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                  params_copy = params.dup
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

            
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                  # Extract relationships
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                  seller_party_id = params_copy.delete(:seller_party_id)
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                  buyer_party_id = params_copy.delete(:buyer_party_id)
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                  buyer_company_contact_id = params_copy.delete(:buyer_company_contact_id)
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

            
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                  # Build JSON API structure
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                  json_api_params = {
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                    data: {
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                      type: 'invoices',
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                      attributes: params_copy
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                    }
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                  }
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

            
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                  # Add relationships if present
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                  if seller_party_id || buyer_party_id || buyer_company_contact_id
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                    json_api_params[:data][:relationships] = {}
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

            
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                    if seller_party_id
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                      json_api_params[:data][:relationships][:seller_party] = {
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                        data: { type: 'companies', id: seller_party_id.to_s }
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                      }
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                    end
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

            
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                    if buyer_party_id
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                      json_api_params[:data][:relationships][:buyer_party] = {
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                        data: { type: 'companies', id: buyer_party_id.to_s }
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                      }
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                    end
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

            
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                    if buyer_company_contact_id
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                      json_api_params[:data][:relationships][:buyer_company_contact] = {
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                        data: { type: 'company_contacts', id: buyer_company_contact_id.to_s }
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                      }
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                    end
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                  end
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

            
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

                  json_api_params
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                end
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

              end
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

            end
          
      397.

    0.0% lines covered

    138 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 138 lines missed.

                def all(token:, params: {})
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  response = get('/products', token: token, params: params)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  products = []
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  if response[:data].is_a?(Array)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    products = response[:data].map do |product_data|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                      transform_api_response({ data: product_data })
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  {
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    products: products,
          
      16.

                    meta: response[:meta]

                end

                def find(id, token:)

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format
          
      24.

                  if response[:data]

                    transform_api_response(response)

                def create(params, token:)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Map client field names to API field names
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  api_params = {
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    sku: params[:sku],
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    name: params[:name],
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    description: params[:description],
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    is_active: params[:is_active].nil? ? true : params[:is_active],
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    base_price: params[:base_price],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    currency_code: params[:currency_code] || 'EUR',
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    tax_rate: params[:tax_rate] || 21.0
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  }.compact
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  response = post('/products', token: token, body: {
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    data: {
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      type: 'products',
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  })
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Transform the response
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  if response[:data]
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    transform_api_response(response)
          
      53.

                    response
          
      55.

      56.

                end
          
      57.

                def update(id, params, token:)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  # Map client field names to API field names
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  api_params = {
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    sku: params[:sku],
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62.

                    description: params[:description],

                    is_active: params[:is_active],

                    base_price: params[:base_price],

    66. 
            

            

                    currency_code: params[:currency_code],
          
      67.

                    tax_rate: params[:tax_rate]
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  }.compact
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70.

                  response = put("/products/#{id}", token: token, body: {
          
      71.

                  })
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  # Transform the response
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  if response[:data]
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    transform_api_response(response)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  else

                    response

                end

                def search(query, token:, params: {})
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  search_params = params.merge(q: query)

      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  # Transform JSON API format to expected format

    94. 
            

            

                  products = []

                def by_tax_rate(tax_rate, token:, params: {})

                def transform_api_response(api_response)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  attributes = api_response.dig(:data, :attributes) || {}
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  {
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    id: api_response.dig(:data, :id),
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    sku: attributes[:sku],
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    name: attributes[:name],
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    description: attributes[:description],
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    is_active: attributes[:is_active],
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    base_price: attributes[:base_price],
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    currency_code: attributes[:currency_code],
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    tax_rate: attributes[:tax_rate],
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    # Computed attributes from API
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    price_with_tax: attributes[:price_with_tax],
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    display_name: attributes[:display_name],
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    formatted_price: attributes[:formatted_price],
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    tax_description: attributes[:tax_description],
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    standard_tax: attributes[:standard_tax],
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167.

      168.

                    super_reduced_tax: attributes[:super_reduced_tax],
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169.

      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                end

              end

                def list_users(company_id:, token:)

    5.

    6. 
            

            

                  
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  if response.is_a?(Hash) && response[:data]

    8. 
            

            

                    response[:data]
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  elsif response.is_a?(Array)

                  end

      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

      16.

                def available_roles(company_id:, token:)

              def self.all(token:)

                # Transform to expected format for tests

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  workflows = result[:data].map do |workflow|
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    attributes = workflow[:attributes] || {}
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    {
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      id: workflow[:id],
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      name: attributes[:name],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      description: attributes[:description]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  { workflows: workflows }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                else
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Fallback for mock/test data
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  { workflows: [] }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def self.definition(definition_id, token:)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                response = get("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}", token: token)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                transform_definition_response(response)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def self.create_definition(params, token:)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: WorkflowService.create_definition called with params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                body = {
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  data: {
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    attributes: params
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: WorkflowService.create_definition posting to API with body: #{body.inspect}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                response = post('/workflow_definitions', body: body, token: token)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: WorkflowService.create_definition raw response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                result = transform_definition_response(response)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "DEBUG: WorkflowService.create_definition transformed result: #{result.inspect}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                result
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              def self.update_definition(definition_id, params, token:)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                body = {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  data: {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    attributes: params
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                response = put("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}", body: body, token: token)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                transform_definition_response(response)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              def self.delete_definition(definition_id, token:)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                delete("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}", token: token)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def self.definition_states(definition_id, token:)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                get("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/states", token: token)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              def self.definition_transitions(definition_id, token:)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                get("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/transitions", token: token)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def self.bulk_transition(invoice_ids, status:, comment: nil, token:)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                body = {
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  invoice_ids: invoice_ids,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  status: status,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  comment: comment
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                }.compact
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                post("/invoices/bulk_transition", body: body, token: token)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              # Workflow States CRUD - Fixed URLs to match backend implementation
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              def self.state(definition_id, state_id, token:)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                get("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/states/#{state_id}", token: token)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def self.create_state(definition_id, params, token:)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                body = { workflow_state: params }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                post("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/states", body: body, token: token)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def self.update_state(definition_id, state_id, params, token:)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                body = { workflow_state: params }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                put("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/states/#{state_id}", body: body, token: token)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              def self.delete_state(definition_id, state_id, token:)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                delete("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/states/#{state_id}", token: token)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              # Workflow Transitions CRUD - Fixed URLs and method naming
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              def self.get_transition(definition_id, transition_id, token:)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                get("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/transitions/#{transition_id}", token: token)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              def self.create_transition(definition_id, params, token:)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                body = { workflow_transition: params }
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                post("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/transitions", body: body, token: token)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              def self.update_transition(definition_id, transition_id, params, token:)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                body = { workflow_transition: params }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                put("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/transitions/#{transition_id}", body: body, token: token)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              def self.delete_transition(definition_id, transition_id, token:)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                delete("/workflow_definitions/#{definition_id}/transitions/#{transition_id}", token: token)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              # Note: The following methods were removed as they don't exist in the API:
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              # - rules, create_rule, update_rule, delete_rule (workflow rules CRUD)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              # - templates, create_template, apply_template (workflow templates)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              #
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              # The API uses workflow_definitions instead of rules/templates.
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              private
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def self.transform_definition_response(response)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                return response unless response.is_a?(Hash) && response[:data]
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                data = response[:data]
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                attributes = data[:attributes] || {}
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                {
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  id: data[:id],
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  name: attributes[:name],
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  code: attributes[:code],
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  description: attributes[:description],
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  company_id: attributes[:company_id],
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  is_active: attributes[:is_active],
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  is_default: attributes[:is_default],
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  is_global: attributes[:is_global],
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  version: attributes[:version],
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  created_at: attributes[:created_at],
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  updated_at: attributes[:updated_at],
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  states: attributes[:states] || [],
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  transitions: attributes[:transitions] || []
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                }
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            end
          
      170.
